public void setSingleSelection(boolean flag)
Sets the single selection flag.
Parameters:
flag - true means single selection.

flag true means single selection.

Parameters:

getSelections

public ViewerGizmoList getSelections()
Returns a list of selected ViewerGizmos. If none are selected it returns null.
